item.title: Common Tips & Tricks for Competitive Programming
item.description: Common Tips & Tricks for Competitive Programming. Big-O: Time Complexity Order O(1) < O(log n) < O(\sqrt{n}) < n < n log n < n2< n3… < 2n< 3n… < n! < nnnCr If you have a list of numbers and wants to count the number of pair can be formed in a list. e.g. Problem Statement : CodeChef : PLMU Given an array of N integers, find the number of pairs of (i,j) that satisfies the condition A[i]+A[j] = A[i]*A[j].
